entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @atrupar We will see how healthy he is. The coronavirus spreads in the USA like fire and Trump doesn't care. He had contact with members of the third world in the last couple of weeks that don't take any precaution neither. It's just a question of days until the corona reaches the WH.
